<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	a. AMI and each SUBLICENSEE shall defend, indemnify and hold harmless
	USC and its trustees, officers, medical and professional staff, employees and agents and their respective successors, heirs and assigns (the &#147;Indemnitees&#148;), against
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	liabilities, demands, losses, costs, and
	expenses (including without limitation attorneys&#146; fees) incurred by or imposed upon the Indemnitees or any one of them in connection with any third party claims, suits, actions, demands or judgments arising out of any theory of liability
	(including but not limited to, actions in the form of tort, warranty, or strict liability) for death, personal injury, illness, or property damage arising from AMI or SUBLICENSEE&#146;s use, sale, or other disposition of the PATENTS, or PRODUCTS,
	with the exception of such harm caused by the actions of Indemnitee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	b. AMI agrees, at its own expense, (and AMI shall cause each
	SUBLICENSEE at its own expense) to provide attorneys reasonably acceptable to USC to defend against any actions brought or filed against any party indemnified hereunder with respect to the subject of indemnity contained herein, whether or not such
	actions are rightfully brought. To the extent that any proposed settlement directly affects USC, AMI shall obtain the approval of USC before finally agreeing to such settlement proposal, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage219"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	e.
<U>
	Certificate of Insurance and Self-Insurance by Sublicensee.
</U>
	A Certificate evidencing
	the
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	liability policy of a SUBLICENSEE shall be timely delivered to USC after AMI&#146;s execution of each and any sublicense agreement and a Certificate evidencing the product liability coverage shall be delivered prior to
	first manufacture of any PRODUCTS by the SUBLICENSEE. In the event a prospective SUBLICENSEE does not maintain such insurance, but is self-insured, or carries a substantial self-retention, then AMI must request USC&#146;s written permission prior to
	AMI&#146;s grant of sublicense to said prospective SUBLICENSEE; whereupon such request, USC may grant permission for such sublicense only if, in the sole discretion of USC, the
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	of such prospective SUBLICENSEE are deemed
	sufficient to protect USC&#146;s economic interests in the event of claims, liability, demands, damages, expenses and losses from
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	24.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	ATTORNEYS&#146; FEES
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In any action on or concerning this Agreement, the
<B>
	[***
	Confidential]
</B>
	reasonable attorneys&#146; fees, costs and necessary disbursements,
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	25.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	COMMERCIAL PERFORMANCE
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	a.
<B>
	[
</B>
<B>
	*** Confidential
</B>
<B>
	]
</B>
	Reports.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	AMI shall
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	to test, develop the PRODUCT for commercial purposes
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	.
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	during the term of this Agreement, AMI shall submit to USC a report (the &#147;
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	Report&#148;) detailing AMI&#146;s
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	for
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	as well as
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	which AMI
	undertook
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	. The reports shall identify
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	demonstrating that the AMI is
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	. USC shall treat the
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	Report as confidential and shall not disclose the
	contents of the report outside of USC.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	b. Company Visitation Rights.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	after the Effective Date, a representative of USC shall have the option to visit
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	AMI and
	of each SUBLICENSEE, upon reasonable prior notice, to be presented with
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	organized to support the
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	of the PATENTS and the
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	of the PRODUCTS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	c. Mandatory Performance Milestones.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If AMI fails to reach any of the milestones 25.c.i or 25.c.ii below (such milestones, the &#147;Mandatory Performance Milestones&#148;), then
	USC shall thereafter have the option at any time to terminate the Agreement upon written notice to AMI, as provided in paragraph 15(b):
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	25.c.i.
<I>
	Product Research
</I>
	. AMI shall fund product research efforts to
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	certain PRODUCTS; such funding to be
	supported by
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	, until such time as AMI enters into a definitive written sublicense agreement with a SUBLICENSEE to
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	the PRODUCTS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	25.c.ii.
<I>
	Sublicensing Diligence
</I>
	.
<I>
</I>
	Prior to
<I>
</I>
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	of the Effective Date of this Agreement, AMI shall
	enter into a definitive written sublicense agreement with a
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	[*** Confidential] indicates
	material omitted and subject to a confidential information request, which has been filed separately with the SEC.
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage220"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	SUBLICENSEE to
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	the PRODUCTS, the terms and conditions of which sublicense agreement shall be consistent with the relevant terms and conditions of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	26.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	EXPORT CONTROLS
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It is understood that USC is subject to United States laws and
	regulations controlling the export of technical data, computer software, laboratory prototypes and other commodities (such laws include the Arms Export Control Act, as amended and the Export Administration Act), and that its obligations hereunder
	are contingent on compliance with applicable United States export laws and regulations. The transfer of certain technical data and commodities by the AMI may require a license from the cognizant agency of the United States Government and/or written
	assurances by AMI that AMI shall not export data or commodities to certain foreign countries without prior approval of such agency. USC neither represents that a license shall not be required nor that, if required, it shall be issued. AMI shall not
	engage in any activity in connection with this Agreement that is in violation of any applicable U.S. law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	27.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In rendering performances under this Agreement, AMI will
	function solely as an independent contractor and not as agent, partner, employee or joint venturer with USC. Nothing in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to create the relationship of principal and agent, or of partnership or joint
	venture, and neither party shall hold itself out as an agent, legal representative, partner, subsidiary, joint venturer, servant or employee of the other. Neither party nor any officer, employee, agent or representative thereof shall, in any event,
	have any right, collectively or individually, to bind the other party, to make any representations or warranties, to accept service of process, to receive notice or to perform any act or thing on behalf of the other party, except as expressly
	authorized under this Agreement or in writing by such other party in its sole discretion.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<B>
	28.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	WAIVER
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No waiver by either party of any default or breach shall be deemed as a waiver
	of prior or subsequent default or breach of the same or other provisions of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	29.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EXCEPT FOR AMI&#146;S INDEMNIFICATION OBLIGATIONS HEREIN, TO
	THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, IN NO EVENT WILL EITHER PARTY BE RESPONSIBLE TO THE OTHER FOR ANY INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, INCLUDING DAMAGES FOR LOST GOODWILL, LOST PROFITS, LOST
	BUSINESS OR OTHER INDIRECT ECONOMIC DAMAGES, WHETHER SUCH CLAIM FOR INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES IS BASED ON CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE, TORT (INCLUDING STRICT LIABILITY) OR OTHER LEGAL THEORY, AS A RESULT
	OF A BREACH OF ANY WARRANTY OR ANY OTHER TERM OF THIS AGREEMENT, AND REGARDLESS OF WHETHER A PARTY WAS ADVISED OR HAD REASON TO KNOW OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES IN ADVANCE.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Subject to Confidential Treatment Request

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.15
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT
	TO THE LICENSE AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	between
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	THE UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	ALFRED E. MANN
	INSTITUTE FOR BIOMEDICAL ENGINEERING AT THE UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	for
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	NanoPulse Technology
</B>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage224"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	AMENDMENT TO THE LICENSE AGREEMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment to the License Agreement (the &#147;Amendment&#148;) is effective this 8
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of
	September, 2014 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) between THE UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA, a California nonprofit corporation (&#147;USC&#148;); ALFRED E. MANN INSTITUTE FOR BIOMEDICAL ENGINEERING AT THE UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA, a
	Delaware corporation (&#147;AMI-USC&#148;); and ElectroBlate, a Nevada Corporation (&#147;ELECTROBLATE&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	BACKGROUND
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	USC and AMI-USC are parties to a license agreement effective February&nbsp;11, 2008 (the &#147;Agreement&#148;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	AMI-USC sublicensed its rights to ThelioPulse, Inc., a Delaware Corporation (&#147;TPI&#148;), effective February&nbsp;27, 2012 (the &#147;Sublicense&#148;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	ELECTROBLATE desires to obtain all of USC&#146;s rights licensed pursuant to the Agreement and all of AMI-USC&#146;s rights in nanopulse-related patents and know-how, that are not subject to the Agreement and that are
	described in Exhibit B to this Amendment, directly from USC and AMI-USC, respectively, and USC and AMI-USC desire to grant such rights to ELECTROBLATE, on the terms and subject to the conditions set forth below.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	AMI-USC and TPI have agreed to terminate their Sublicense simultaneously with the execution of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	USC acknowledges and accepts that AMI-USC has fulfilled all of the milestones of mandatory performance milestones of Paragraph 25c of the Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.6
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	ELECTROBLATE and TPI desire that TPI merge with and into ELECTROBLATE pursuant to Internal Revenue Code &#167; 368(a)(1)(A) with ELECTROBLATE as the surviving corporation, pursuant to a merger agreement to be executed
	by TPI and ELECTROBLATE (the &#147;Agreement and Plan of Merger&#148;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Therefore, in view of the foregoing, USC, AMI-USC, and ELECTROBLATE
	hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	DEFINITIONS
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	All definitions and paragraph numbers referred to in this Amendment and not otherwise defined herein shall have the same meaning as in the Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	AMENDMENTS
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	AMI-USC, USC, and ELECTROBLATE agree that as of the Effective Date, ELECTROBLATE shall assume all of AMI-USC&#146;s rights and obligations under the Agreement, as amended, with the exception of AMI&#146;s right to
	receive and distribute equity according to Paragraph 5 of the Agreement as amended herein.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	material omitted and subject to a confidential information request, which has been filed separately with the SEC.

	Page 2/7

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Background of the Agreement is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This &#147;Patent License Agreement for Nanopulse Technology&#148; (hereinafter, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) is between the UNIVERSITY OF
	SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA, (hereinafter &#147;USC&#148;) a California nonprofit corporation with its principal place of business at University Park, Los Angeles, California 90089, and ElectroBlate, a corporation existing under the laws of the State of
	Nevada, (hereinafter &#147;ELECTROBLATE&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, prior to the &#147;Effective Date&#148; set forth below, USC pursued research
	conducted by USC persons and which research was wholly funded by USC and the United States Government; and from which research arose the &#147;PATENTS&#148; set forth below; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WHEREAS, ELECTROBLATE desires to obtain, and USC is willing to grant to ELECTROBLATE, a worldwide license in the &#147;Field of Use&#148; to
	certain rights in the PATENTS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:13%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the covenants herein contained, the parties agree as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Paragraph 5 of the Agreement is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	a.
<I>
<U>
	ELECTROBLATE EQUITY.
</U>
</I>
	Within sixty (60)&nbsp;days of the Effective Date of this Amendment, ELECTROBLATE shall
	issue, in accordance with the &#147;Agreement and Plan of Merger,&#148; shares of its common stock to AMI-USC, or AMI-USC&#146;s designee(s), as designated by AMI-USC in its sole discretion. AMI-USC shall divide, or shall have directed ELECTROBLATE
	to divide, such Common Stock among the following parties in the amounts specified below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	;

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	a.
	This Agreement may be terminated at any time by mutual written consent of AMI-USC, USC, and ELECTROBLATE.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	b. Notwithstanding the
	provisions of paragraph 15(a), USC may terminate this Agreement effective immediately upon the postmarked date of delivery of written notice to
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	[*** Confidential] indicates
	material omitted and subject to a confidential information request, which has been filed separately with the SEC.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Page 3/7
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage226"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ELECTROBLATE if either: a) ELECTROBLATE fails to receive at least $3 million in private cash funding by January&nbsp;1, 2016; or b) ELECTROBLATE makes an assignment for the benefit of creditors,
	or has a bankruptcy petition filed by or against it which is not vacated within
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	, or a receiver or trustee in bankruptcy or similar officer is appointed to take charge of all or part of ELECTROBLATE&#146;s property.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	c. Upon any termination of this Agreement all rights granted to or provided by each party to the other shall automatically and irrevocably
	revert to the granting party. Any sublicenses granted by ELECTROBLATE to SUBLICENSEES shall immediately terminate upon any termination of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	d. Surviving any valid termination of this Agreement are:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) Any financial or fiduciary obligations that have matured prior to any termination of this Agreement, such as without limitation the
	allocation of any ELECTROBLATE common stock specified in paragraph 5;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) ELECTROBLATE&#146;s obligation of Paragraph 8 to keep and
	allow a final audit;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) Any cause of action or claim of ELECTROBLATE, AMI-USC, or USC, accrued or to accrue, because of any breach or
	default by the other party; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) The provisions of Paragraphs 21, 22, 23, and 29.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	e. Upon termination of this Agreement, ELECTROBLATE agrees to immediately discontinue (and shall cause each SUBLICENSEE to discontinue) the
	manufacture and sale of the PRODUCTS and the use of the PATENTS. Within
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	after such termination, ELECTROBLATE shall provide USC with a written inventory of all PRODUCTS currently in its stock (and in the stock of any
	SUBLICENSEE) as of the date of termination (the &#147;INVENTORY&#148;). USC shall have the option to grant to AMI and/or each SUBLICENSEE the privilege of disposing of such INVENTORY at normal prices within
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	after said
	termination. The disposition of all such INVENTORY, however, shall be subject to all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. After the
<B>
	[*** Confidential]
</B>
	sell-off period, ELECTROBLATE shall destroy or return to USC all remaining unsold
	PRODUCTS in its possession, all equipment used by ELECTROBLATE and any SUBLICENSEE in the manufacture of the PRODUCTS and all packaging and marketing materials in its possession pertaining to the PRODUCTS, and shall certify their destruction or
	return to USC specifying the number of each destroyed or returned. All payment obligations hereunder, including without limitation any portion common stock grant to ELECTROBLATE corresponding to the then-current Calendar Year that remains unpaid as
	of the effective date of termination, shall be accelerated and shall become immediately due and payable.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Section&nbsp;16 of the Agreement is amended to add the following receiving party of notices:
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ELECTROBLATE:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:17%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ElectroBlate,
	Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:17%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	3.6

	Exhibit A of the Agreement is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the new attached Exhibit A.
</TD>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	RELATED AGREEMENTS
</B>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	It is a condition to the execution and delivery of this Amendment that TPI and AMI-USC simultaneously execute a termination and release of their Sublicense, that AMI-USC assigns to ELECTROBLATE its nanopulse-related
	patents and know-how that are not subject to the Agreement and that are described in Exhibit B to this Amendment, and that ThelioPulse and Electroblate execute the &#147;Agreement and Plan of Merger&#148;.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The remaining provisions of the Agreement remain in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts. Delivery of an executed counterpart of this Amendment by facsimile or a PDF data file or other
	scanned executed counterpart by email shall be equally as effective as delivery of a manually executed counterpart of this Amendment. Each duplicate and counterpart of this Amendment shall be equally admissible in evidence, and each shall fully bind
	each party who has executed it. The parties agree that a copy of the original signature (including an electronic copy) may be used for any and all purposes in respect of this Amendment for which the original signature may have been used. The parties
	agree that neither party will have any rights to challenge the use or authenticity of a counterpart of this Amendment based solely on that its signature, or the signature of the other party, on such counterpart is not an original signature.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_23>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_23"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 23.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/05/03/0001193125-16-575202_G11949G95W15.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To the Board of Directors
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Pulse Biosciences, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We hereby consent to the use in the Prospectus constituting a part of this pre-effective amendment number&nbsp;3 to Form S-1 Registration Statement
	(registration number 333-208694) of our report dated March&nbsp;7, 2016, relating to the consolidated balance sheets of Pulse Biosciences, Inc. (as defined in Note 1 to the consolidated financial statements) (the &#147;Company&#148;) as of
	December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014, and the related consolidated statements of operations, stockholders&#146; equity, and cash flows for the year ended December 31, 2015 and for the period from May&nbsp;19, 2014 (inception) through December&nbsp;31,
	2014, which is contained in the Prospectus. Our report contains an explanatory paragraph regarding the Company&#146;s ability to continue as a going concern.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We also consent to the reference to us under the caption &#147;Experts&#148; in the Prospectus.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	/s/ Gumbiner Savett Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	May 3, 2016
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Santa Monica, California
</P>
</EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_23>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_23>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_23_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 23.2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

</P>
<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To the Board of Directors
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Pulse Biosciences, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We hereby consent to the use in the Prospectus constituting a part of this pre-effective amendment number 3 to Form S-1 Registration Statement (registration
	number 333-208694) of our report dated December 21, 2015, relating to the consolidated balance sheets of BioElectroMed Corp. and Subsidiary (the &#147;Company&#148;) as of December&nbsp;31, 2013 and 2012, and the related consolidated statements of
	comprehensive income (loss), stockholders&#146; equity, and cash flows for each of the years in the two-year period ended December&nbsp;31, 2013, which is contained in the Prospectus. Our report contains an explanatory paragraph regarding the
	Company&#146;s ability to continue as a going concern.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We also consent to the reference to us under the caption &#147;Experts&#148; in the Prospectus.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	/s/ Gumbiner Savett Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	May 3, 2016
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Santa Monica, California
</P>
</EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_23>

<B>
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To the Board of Directors
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Pulse Biosciences, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We hereby consent to the use in the Prospectus constituting a part of this pre-effective amendment number 3 to Form S-1 Registration Statement (registration
	number 333-208694) of our report dated December 21, 2015, relating to the balance sheets of ThelioPulse, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) as of December&nbsp;31, 2013 and 2012, and the related statements of operations, stockholders&#146; deficiency,
	and cash flows for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2013 and for the period from January&nbsp;5, 2012 (inception) through December&nbsp;31, 2012, which is contained in the Prospectus. Our report contains an explanatory paragraph regarding the
	Company&#146;s ability to continue as a going concern.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We also consent to the reference to us under the caption &#147;Experts&#148; in the Prospectus.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	/s/ Gumbiner Savett Inc.
</P>

	May 3, 2016

	Santa Monica, California
